entry.tran: 灭鼠人;以消灭有害动物为职业的人
entry.def: An exterminator is a person whose job is to kill animals such as rats or mice, because they are annoying or dangerous.

example.ex: One hundred million rats are killed each year by pest exterminators.
example.tran: 每年灭鼠人员都会杀死1亿只老鼠。

means.word_mean: 1. someone who exterminates (especially someone whose occupation is the extermination of troublesome rodents and insects)
